description:
Learning to sketch free-hand is not only fun, but is a great way to spark your creativity and imagination and make it come to life on paper. This course will enable you to stimulate your artistic-being and will give you the tools and techniques necessary to draw quickly and efficiently.

In this course you will learn to draw and sketch:

  • human figures
  • eyes
  • hands
  • faces & heads
  • buildings & cities
  • perspective, angles, & dimensions
  • cars
  • .....and more

Master one of the most challenging and sought-after skills -drawing & sketching-, not merely by tracing or copying detailed images but by creating any type of drawing from scratch.

This is an extensive course with over 30 lectures which includes everything necessary that you will need to know to draw well. We have designed the lessons in a progressive format, starting with the basics, in a very visual, quick, and easy to follow method.

We have included original techniques throughout the course, which are shortcuts to teach you to draw and create almost anything on your own, after you have completed the course.
title: Sketching: How to Draw People, Hands, Eyes, Buildings & Cars
